text: Kenneth Lambert (7 June 1928 – 29 June 2002) was an English professional footballer from Sheffield. His clubs included Barnsley, Swindon Town, Gillingham and Bradford City. He made 97 Football League appearances. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield Category:English footballers Category:Gillingham F.C. players Category:Barnsley F.C. players Category:Swindon Town F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Matlock Town F.C. players Category:Association football wing halves
title: Ken Lambert
